mapper.select: select inn_name,book_checkin, book_checkout, inn_price, book_count, member_id, master from (select b.book_no,b.book_checkin, b.book_checkout, b.book_count, b.member_id,b.inn_no,i.inn_price,i.member_id as master, i.inn_name from book b, inn i where b.inn_no=i.inn_no ) where book_checkout < sysdate
mapper.delete: delete from book where book_checkout < sysdate
